# Load required libraries
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

# Load data
data <- fromJSON("data/results.json")

# Prepare success/failure table
summary <- data %>%
  group_by(resource) %>%
  summarize(success_rate = mean(status == "success") * 100)
